item.title: Run MongoDB with Custom Configuration
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Using Custom Configuration File KubeDB supports providing custom configuration for MongoDB. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run a MongoDB database with custom configuration. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using kind.
